column5: Near the Blanco River with full access to 2 private parks. One bedroom with queen size bed, 1 self-inflating queen air mattress with 3 firmness settings, a fully furnished kitchen and large screen cable TV. Try your luck at Bingo on Friday night at the VFW. Local bands frequently provide live music in the square, Market Day is on the First Saturday of every month. Relax, have fun, feed the deer, read a book, take a nap ... Just be sure to bring your camera.
